title: CLIENT makes me want to punch someone
body:
Ay does anybody feel that way? Like it's not something new where you're confused about everything... There is the confusion, but this new client is honestly just so bad... Layout seemed like it was going well on the planning board but then everything just got crowded again trying to organise all the little things and RIOT just got too lazy and didnt scrap the idea because they liked it so much

YA BOY AGREES WITH ANOTHER POST. OPTION FOR OLD CLIENT. #FKTHENEWSHIT

replies.body:
I share your frustration I spent an entire day trying to find a solution, from uninstalling to reverting back versions. The new client to me feels like one giant ad that I want to click away from.

Good news though, for the time being I can still access old client as an OCE player.
I made a video showing exactly how to do it.
Link: https://youtu.be/ej2n4JzFaP4

Alternatively if you dont trust my link you can find the vid in my channel. 
Youtube.com/JaySea

Hope riot will properly give us our old client back though. Cheers to that, upvote this if it helped you.

Thanks so much Jerey, that's really helpful of you. 

Btw, isn't this just completely and totally mismanaged? Oceania should not have removed their legacy client link yet. Whoever is managing The North American region is smart and knows what needs to be done. At least they have a brain!

Unbelievable!
